content:
pchickey commented on Issue #2861:

cc @abrown lets see if this fixes the weird issue on windows

abrown commented on Issue #2861:

Took the liberty to remove an unused dependency with 5017d90; let's see what happens now...

abrown commented on Issue #2861:

@pchickey, cool, looks like that solved it! I guess the remaining thing to do is figure out if the project is OK allowing ISC licenses, described here. I would lean towards allowing them, since they are not much different than MIT...

abrown commented on Issue #2861:

Thanks @pchickey, this solved the issue. I cherry-picked your commit over to #2859 so I'm going to close this.
